cash.name: Cash
cash.description: Money. Used for buying most stuff.

offshore.name: Offshore Cash
offshore.description: Money, stored in your bank account. Used for Offshore Payday and buying contracts.

continental_coins.name: Continental Coins
continental_coins.description: Alternative currency, used for buying expensive stuff.

crimespree.name: Crime Spree
crimespree.description: A chain of heists, used for farming continental coins.

crimespree_record.name: Crime Spree Record
crimespree_record.description: The record for a user's highest crime spree level.

join.name: Join Time
join.description: The time when a criminal joins CRIME.NET.

char.name: Character
char.description: The criminal's identity. (Or what player they choose to play as.)

weapon.name: Signature Weapon
weapon.description: The signature weapon of a user.

daily.name: Daily Reward Timestamp
daily.description: Timestamp for daily reward for logging onto CRIME.NET.

exp.name: Experience
exp.description: Amount of experience a criminal has.

reputation.name: Reputation Level
reputation.description: The level of reputation a criminal has.

infamy.name: Infamy
infamy.description: The infamy level of a criminal.

dallas.name: Dallas
dallas.fbi:
If this one isnâ€™t actually the leader, heâ€™s definitely the trusted lieutenant. Dallas is one of the original four that emerged in 2011. He appears to be the Mastermind of the gang, and his calm demeanor under fire suggests both great experience and cunning intelligence.

Security footage notes his hair is greying, possibly indicating he is one of the oldest members of the gang.

His smiling clown mask with the American pattern has become the face for the Payday gang.
quotes: AAAAAHHHH! I need a medic bag!

chains.name: Chains
chains.fbi:
We regard this one as the Enforcer in the gang. He tends to bring the biggest gun and a lot of ammo to feed it. Breaking down his movement, style and technique, it is obvious that â€œChains" is ex-military. It is likely he was special forces, and, based on overheard conversation, possibly even a former Navy SEAL.

â€œChains" appears to have a daredevil personality, and a strong conviction that he cannot be hurt or killed.

Recently, we know that â€œChains" was taking refuge in a Swedish safehouse. It was believed that he had been killed when Swedish police raided the safehouse, but "Chains" has since resurfaced in Washington.
quotes: Don't you be tricky now! Chains hates tricky.

w_amcar.name: AMCAR
w_amcar.description: Fully automatic 5.56mm. Decent accuracy and damage.

w_ak.name: AK Rifle
w_ak.description: 30-round assault rifle. Decent rate of fire and accuracy.

w_car4.name: CAR-4
w_car4.description: 30-round assault rifle. Good handling and accuracy. Very versatile overall.

w_uar.name: UAR Rifle
w_uar.description: 30-round bullpup assault rifle. Good stopping power and accuracy.

w_chimano88.name: Chimano 88
w_chimano88.description: Semi-automatic 9mm. Decent accuracy, decent capacity, decent damage.

w_crosskill.name: Crosskill
w_crosskill.description: Semi-automatic .45ACP. Medium stopping but low capacity.
